pos review: Very good location in the European District, easy to get there. Quickly check-in. The room was cozy and clean and is for the very first time when I can sleep from the first night in an unknown place.
neg review: It's not like I would not have liked something it just because in one night was a little noise cause near the location was paved a street. But not something to disturb our holidays.
